name: Hermit Crabson
description:
In Hermit Crabson, you play as a little hermit crab that had his shell stolen from him. The shell was a gift from his father, so now the little crab has to find the one who stole it and get it back. On his way there, he will face different kinds of enemies that will give him different shells, each with its own properties.

This game was created during the 2019 Global Game Jam, along with some  colleagues.
